title: Attorney investigating Trump critics set to resign, reports say, shortly after president calls for him to be sacked – US politics live
summary: Donald Trump expressed his desire for Erik Siebert to be removed from his role investigating New York Attorney General Letitia James and former FBI Director James Comey. Trump's comments indicate dissatisfaction with Siebert's handling of the investigations. This highlights ongoing tensions between Trump and the legal scrutiny from state and federal officials.

title: Federal agents use teargas and pepper balls to break up Chicago Ice protest
summary: At least two protesters were arrested during a demonstration where a Democratic congressional candidate denounced what they described as "violent abuse of power." The incident highlights ongoing tensions surrounding political protests. The candidate's remarks aim to draw attention to issues of authority and civil rights.

title: The Weir review – a riveting return for Conor McPherson’s lonesome barflies
summary: An Irish playwright's nearly 30-year-old intimate drama blends painful memories with comedy. The production features a flawless cast, enhancing its emotional impact. The performance has been praised for its impressive execution and artistry.

title: Quarter of UK university physics departments at risk of closing, survey finds
summary: A recent survey indicates that four out of five companies are implementing staff cuts, raising alarms among physicists regarding the implications for the UK's leadership in key scientific fields. Experts express "great concern" about the potential impact of these reductions on research and innovation. The situation highlights urgent challenges for maintaining the UK's position in critical areas of science and technology.
